tweets.text:
There are #FloodWarnings in place as #StormChristoph brings heavy rain across England.  

Know what to do in a flood and check your flood risk: https://t.co/MPz7Fwblnq  

#PrepareActSurvive https://t.co/MaE7ptFod2

#FloodWarnings are in force across England as a result of #StormChristoph. #TeamEA have been working 24/7 to keep our communities safe. Stay safe at home and find out what to do in a flood: https://t.co/X4IQl3fUIh  

#PrepareActSurvive https://t.co/EkLRcEMncE

tweets.text: .@EnvAgency Chief Exec @JamesBevanEA tells @CommonsEFRA that #StormChristoph brings 24 to 48 hours of heavy rain to ground that is already saturated. #TeamEA on the ground working with partners to prepare. Check your flood risk here: https://t.co/CnoJPZIDpY https://t.co/DD7vHRRfXh

The @EnvAgency has issued a number of flood alerts for our regions. Keep up to date with the latest advice and guidance for your area and sign up for updates on their website: https://t.co/uW721UEsxS #StormChristoph
@AndynBrown16 @EnvAgencyNW @K_Fletcher_MP All good thanks Andy.
@MeurigRogers @EnvAgencyNW @K_Fletcher_MP Cheers Morgan. Hope all well with you?
@AndynBrown16 @EnvAgencyNW @K_Fletcher_MP Good luck Andy!

My latest stop today was at #Croston #Lancashire where I found Amber & Lynn from @EnvAgencyNW field teams overseeing the operation of our #flood storage basin. #incidents #PrepareActSurvive https://t.co/Ap9yeq1xTW
Heavy rain is expected from #StormChristoph tomorrow - as always sign up to our flood warning service Stay #floodaware https://t.co/xE8Rupk4ct https://t.co/oo3py0fuT1

#DoYouKnow what to do in flood? 

#StormChristoph will bring widespread flood alerts and warnings across the North West over the next few days. 

Check your flood risk here ➡️ https://t.co/ZAITy41Ta6 https://t.co/GMyAQDBuRU
@AndynBrown16 @EnvAgencyNW @K_Fletcher_MP I remember the Croston floods. Many thanks to everyone working hard to prevent flooding.
@AndynBrown16 @EnvAgencyNW @K_Fletcher_MP 27.4mm since 0000Z

#StormChristoph is going to be disruptive, and quite probably dangerous for some. 

Stay tuned to @bbcweather on-air and online, plus @metoffice weather warnings and @EnvAgency flood warnings. https://t.co/lh8kJOlKcK

tweets.text:
#StormChristoph has now reached the North West with heavy rain falling across the whole region. 

Sign up now for free flood warnings ➡️ https://t.co/uGQ4g6A5Xn 

#beprepared #prepareactsurvive https://t.co/gwYxiCjrYe

We know it will happen, yet we still manage the hills to give them the water absorption capacity of tarmac. Stop burning & stop over-grazing to ensure our hills can absorb these storms. Sandbags are not the answer. @EnvAgency @YWDirectors @WildlifeTrusts https://t.co/d5JSR8Ja5N

tweets.text: Over the coming days heavy rain is forecast for Yorkshire and the North East as #StormChristoph hits the region.  To sign up for flood alerts please visit the @EnvAgency website https://t.co/08qhBLjngI people can also call our Incident Hotline on 0800 80 70 60 #PrepareActSurvive https://t.co/z5e85DblaG

Turn around, don't drown!

Remember just one egg cup of water is enough to wreck your engine, and just 15cm of moving water is enough to impact a small car.

Don't drive through floodwater.
@EnvAgency | @itvanglia | @itvweather https://t.co/Gt2T4L1Fj8

tweets.text: #StormChristoph is starting to build up rainfall totals now - map with our rain gauges - blue and green low with amber and red showing higher amounts - expect to see this build and move east. All our latest flood warnings here https://t.co/K5GUW3z87V https://t.co/grUwAFKQF0

tweets.text: @BarnaliJames @EnvAgency @CheshireEast @MiddlewichTC Hello, we are monitoring levels on our waterways & operating sluices as necessary. The River Croco to the left is the responsibility of the Environmental Agency, who are also managing water levels. If you happen to see any issues please contact us: https://t.co/1y0bYbjWCp. Thanks

I am always the first to criticise the @EnvAgency but they have been fantastic the last 48hrs. Good comms and on banks sheeting and hopefully sandbagging! Thank You! @NRobinsonEA @EnvAgencyMids @simonfisherNFU

#StormChristoph comes in two main phases...

PHASE 1 - Tues to Thurs 💦
Heavy rain brings flooding to N Eng & Midlands.

PHASE 2 - Thurs 💨❄️
Heavy snow and stronger winds (blizzards) in Scot and parts of N Eng.

 https://t.co/WcO8GkKaNH

tweets.text: @RobStoneman @EnvAgency @YWDirectors @WildlifeTrusts We don't actually have robust evidence to link burning to flooding - most is on eroding/bare peat. Moreover, we also don't know yet what rewetted, completely saturated peatlands do under such conditions (where will water go)? Very important questions to really find answers to.

Weather warnings for heavy rain and flooding have been issued across South #Yorkshire.

I am monitoring the situation closely and our councils, @EnvAgency and @YorkshireWater are working round the clock to protect homes & businesses. Stay safe. https://t.co/dmEVKAbiO0

tweets.text: Rivers are starting to respond to the rain from #StormChristoph @EnvAgencyNW is putting flood alerts onto rivers across the #northwest you can see your local river levels at https://t.co/Upp5X7LwZ9 https://t.co/2rXintxOH9

Today @JamesBevanEA told us that #StormChristoph is set to bring expecting 'heavy and prolonged' rainfall onto saturated ground, posing risks of flooding to a 'substantial number' of properties and communities.

He lays out the steps that @EnvAgency are taking here 👇 https://t.co/NLEokNjBNx

urls.title: Find out if you're at risk of flooding in England
urls.description: Check your risk of flooding: get current flood warnings, check the 5-day forecast or use flood maps

tweets.text: 30cm of flowing water is enough to move your car. Never drive through flood water. What to do during a flood: https://t.co/yOnoPDvQSt #prepareactsurvive https://t.co/YVW0JKGIql
🌨 There is an amber flood alert for rain and possible flooding in certain areas of Newark and Sherwood. This alert has been issued by the @EnvAgency affecting the River Maun and the River Trent.

There are a number of flood warnings in place across England, with heavy rainfall expected in the next few days.

By knowing what to do in a #flood, you can reduce the impacts to your home, family and possessions.

Check your flood risk: https://t.co/MPz7FwsWeY 

#StormCristoph https://t.co/FMPUiziILV

tweets.text:
We are expecting heavy rainfall across #Yorkshire this week. 
Get the latest flood info & sign up to receive flood warnings here: 
https://t.co/OVBXgMyngb
#PrepareActSurvive https://t.co/WMqZBhzoxy

Our #Derbyshire field team have deployed some flood protection in #Bakewell in advance of #StormChristoph. Please abide by the Footpath Closed signs and do not put yourself at risk by climbing over the wooden boards. https://t.co/j1K3e6zSxp

Plans are in place for potential flooding incidents in Northwich over the next few days: https://t.co/AJlXlmmDT7

Follow @EnvAgencyNW and sign up to receive flood alerts and warnings at: https://t.co/lEDfKdIQld #FloodAware #StormChristoph https://t.co/LizhbO6OD8

Heavy showers this week could lead to surface water and river flooding in some communities. Our teams are ready to respond. 

Check your flood risk and sign up for free flood warnings: https://t.co/uGQ4g6A5Xn https://t.co/O8cil5emkC

Monksleaze was closed early this morning, the Sowy has returned to its normal winter level. We will be allowing the KSD level to fall substantially overnight to allow for some new flow monitoring equipment to be installed before the next band of rain comes in. #KSD  @EnvAgencySW

We’re making sure rivers and streams aren’t blocked by debris…

Like here at Hamstreet, near #Ashford, in #Kent

Rubbish and branches – and the occasional tree – increase flood-risk… 

Check and register for flood alerts: https://t.co/6wEuixUq8S
#StormChristoph #floodaware https://t.co/926np7FLp0

Making a journey this week? Please do not drive through #flood water. Check your route before you travel: https://t.co/tumDuoEmi2 Remember just one egg cup of water is enough to wreck your engine. #StormChristoph  #PrepareActSurvive #SafetyFirst https://t.co/di6rCwoPtZ
